pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Factor Model // Generalized factor model for ultra- high dimensional variables with mixed types. We develop a two- step iterative procedure so that each update can be carried out in parallel across all variables and samples. The fast computation version is provided for ultra-high dimensional data, see examples for more details. More details can be referred to Wei Liu, Huazhen Lin, Shurong Zheng and Jin Liu. (2021) doi:10.1080/01621459.2021.1999818.
